title: Target genome schema
description: Validates the JSON representation of a samplesheet

sampleset.description: Sampleset name must be provided and cannot contain spaces

path.description: A list of resolved target genome file paths

chrom.description: Specify the chromosome of associated genotyping data (must be in {1-22, X, XY, Y}). If all chromosomes are in the associated file (e.g. your data is not split by chromosome), set to null.

vcf_genotype_field.description: Specify whether to import genotypes (default: GT), or imputed dosages (DS) from the VCF file.
